ing: 2 cups sugar-free diet orange-flavored carbonated beverage
des: "This easy baked apple recipe makes a great dessert or snack. Use whatever fruit-flavored diet soda catches your fancy."
ins:
Preheat an oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
Arrange the apples into a baking dish with the cut sides facing down. Pour the orange beverage over the apples.
Bake in the preheated oven until the apples are tender, about 1 hour.
